issue.title: [Cython] read_tensor should work with a readable file
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1152](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1152). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Instead at the moment it requires a writeable file:

https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/bea30d6c24ac07b9c4b29ba1523a13dcd27d578b/python/pyarrow/io.pxi#L1257
